org.drip.product.credit

Class BondComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.product.definition.Component
        • org.drip.product.definition.CalibratableComponent
          • org.drip.product.definition.CreditComponent
            • org.drip.product.definition.Bond
              • org.drip.product.credit.BondComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BondProduct, ComponentMarketParamRef

    public class BondComponent
extends Bond
implements BondProduct
    This is the base class that extends CreditComponent abstract class and implements the functionality behind bonds of all kinds. Bond static data is captured in a set of 11 container classes – BondTSYParams, BondCouponParams, BondNotionalParams, BondFloaterParams, BondCurrencyParams, BondIdentifierParams, BondIRValuationParams, CompCRValParams, BondCFTerminationEvent, BondFixedPeriodGenerationParams, and one EmbeddedOptionSchedule object instance each for the call and the put objects. Each of these parameter set can be set separately.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BondComponent.BondCalibrator
      The BondCalibrator implements a calibrator that calibrates the yield, the credit basis, or the Z Spread for the bond given the price input.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.drip.service.stream.Serializer

        NULL_SER_STRING, VERSION

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BondComponent()
      Constructor: Constructs an empty bond object
      BondComponent(byte[] ab)
      Bond de-serialization from input byte array

        dblWorkoutDate - JulianDate work-out
        dblWorkoutFactor - Work-out factor
        dblYield - Yield to work-out input
        Returns:
        Calculated PECS from yield to work-out
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the PECS cannot be calculated

        dblZSpread - Z Spread to Exercise input
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the G Spread cannot be calculated

        dblISpread - The I Spread to Exercise input
        Returns:
        Calculated convexity from the I Spread to Exercise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the convexity cannot be calculated
